channel.title: Comments for page "The Rack"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Rack"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I'm starting to think the alternate way to obtain The Rack is to challenge her at Ultrafail. The way she talks during that scene it makes it sound like she's a time traveler, and that there's probably a level 2 of her somewhere we haven't discovered yet.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
When I saw "The Rack gives the guy a squinty eye. "Not playing fair, eh? I like it." He checks her out, and bumps the wheel a bit.." message I almost allways got super prize :D
2-3 times (from 3-4 times I saw message)â€¦
P.S. And cheating (I mean without billy) always gives me non-common prize :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: It was always a random chance thing, not an all-the-time thing.

item.title: Wheel bonus change?
item.content:encoded: The description of cheating on the Wheel currently says "Pay n extra Ryo: No Common Rolls" in game. The Rack's "reduced chance of common rolls when cheating" no longer appears to apply. Does anyone know if it was simply removed, or was it changed in some way?
